Package kademlia.dht

Interface KademliaStorageEntryMetadata

All Known Implementing Classes:
StorageEntryMetadata
public interface KademliaStorageEntryMetadata
Keeps track of data for a Content stored in the DHT Used by the StorageEntryManager class
Since:
20140226

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getContentHash()  
    KademliaId getKey()  
    long getLastUpdatedTimestamp()  
    java.lang.String getOwnerId()  
    java.lang.String getType()  
    long lastRepublished()  
    boolean satisfiesParameters​(GetParameter params)
    When a node is looking for content, he sends the search criteria in a GetParameter object Here we take this GetParameter object and check if this StorageEntry satisfies the given parameters
    void updateLastRepublished()
    Whenever we republish a content or get this content from the network, we update the last republished time

  • Method Details

    • getKey

      KademliaId getKey()
      Returns:
      The Kademlia ID of this content

    • getOwnerId

      java.lang.String getOwnerId()
      Returns:
      The content's owner ID

    • getType

      java.lang.String getType()
      Returns:
      The type of this content

    • getContentHash

      int getContentHash()
      Returns:
      A hash of the content

    • getLastUpdatedTimestamp

      long getLastUpdatedTimestamp()
      Returns:
      The last time this content was updated

    • satisfiesParameters

      boolean satisfiesParameters​(GetParameter params)
      When a node is looking for content, he sends the search criteria in a GetParameter object Here we take this GetParameter object and check if this StorageEntry satisfies the given parameters
      Parameters:
      params -
      Returns:
      boolean Whether this content satisfies the parameters

    • lastRepublished

      long lastRepublished()
      Returns:
      The timestamp for the last time this content was republished

    • updateLastRepublished

      void updateLastRepublished()
      Whenever we republish a content or get this content from the network, we update the last republished time
